name: All Charged Up (CornerPoint)
description:
LD 50 Jam Submission

Code by Izokia, Art by akmalhakim, Music by druven Basic Info A quick racing game made for the Ludum Dare 50 Game Jam. For the theme “Delay The Inevitable”, we thought an RC car looking for charge while trying to achieve good lap times would be a pretty fun submission (which it definitely was)
